sentence0.sentece_text: Our study indicates that prolonged incubation of Trypanosoma cruzi infected-LLC-MK2 cells in the presence of 500 microM suramin during the intracellular development of the parasite caused morphological changes on trypomastigote forms characterized by a partial or complete detachment of the flagellum from the cell body, besides an accentuated decrease on parasite motility.
